price: 62.  Waadna og tihiin abuuriddii hore, ee miyeydaan waantoobeyn?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ فَلَوۡلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'tumu al-nashata al-ūlā falawlā tadhakkarūna
